Class Formats

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtfx.lib.util.Formats

  • public class Formats
extends Object
    General formatting utilities.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

      • getNormalizedPattern

        public static String getNormalizedPattern(String pattern)
        Returns the normalized pattern for a date or time.

        The normalized pattern for a date, or the date part of a time-stamp, is always two digit long for days and months and four digit long for the year.

        The normalized pattern for a time, or the time part of a time-stamp, is always two digit long for the hour, the minute and the second.

        In a time or time-stamp, the millisecond part is always three digit long.

        The hour is always converted to the 0-23 format (H).

        Parameters:
        pattern - The original pattern.
        Returns:
        The normalized pattern.

      • getProperties

        private static Map<Integer,Object> getProperties(Locale locale)
        Returns the set of properties given the locale. If the properties has not already been set it sets them, thus always returning a valid map of properties.
        Parameters:
        locale - The locale.
        Returns:
        A map with the properties.

      • unformattedFromTimestamp

        public static String unformattedFromTimestamp(Timestamp timestamp,
                                              boolean millis,
                                              boolean separators)
        Convert from a Timestamp to an unlocalized string with the format yyyymmddhhmmss or yyyymmddhhmmssnnn
        Parameters:
        time-stamp - A Timestamp.
        millis - A boolean to include milliseconds.
        separators - A boolean to include standard separators
        Returns:
        The string.

      • unformattedFromTimestamp

        public static String unformattedFromTimestamp(Timestamp timestamp,
                                              boolean year,
                                              boolean month,
                                              boolean day,
                                              boolean hour,
                                              boolean minute,
                                              boolean second,
                                              boolean millis,
                                              boolean separators)
        Convert from a Timestamp to an unlocalized string with the format yyyymmddhhmmss or yyyymmddhhmmssnnn
        Parameters:
        time-stamp - A Timestamp.
        year - A boolean to include year.
        month - A boolean to include month.
        day - A boolean to include day.
        hour - A boolean to include hour.
        minute - A boolean to include minute.
        second - A boolean to include second.
        millis - A boolean to include milliseconds.
        separators - A boolean to include standard separators
        Returns:
        The string.
